channel.title: The hardest programming language?
channel.description: So what is the hardest and very tough programming language? [code]i think asemblery what do you think?[/code]

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Lolcode. Lmao.
I vote for Malborge. That makes me shit my pants

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:33, topic:122098”]@Pizza pie, why program it in java when you could use Visual Basic, C, PHP, HTML, ASM?

<? echo 'Hello World!'; ?>

Took under 10 seconds… Different languages have different uses.[/quote]
i see wut u have going there

well… i guess malbolge is the hardest one…

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

Brainfuck is remarkably simple, which is why I <3 it.

And lawl did make a server in brainfuck, he wrote his own variant of Brainfuck called Buttfuck that was converted to Java code and then interpreted by a Beanshell interpreter.

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

BrainFuck really is quite easy…

just look at the wiki page

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

@Pizza pie, why program it in java when you could use Visual Basic, C, PHP, HTML, ASM?

<? echo 'Hello World!'; ?>

Took under 10 seconds… Different languages have different uses.

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

you familiar with bf? is it actually is it easy to code? it looks confusing and yea a VERY SIMPLE language compared to java… no matter how long ive practiced java… it just keeps coming up with new stuff!

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Actually, Brainfuck is more like needlessly simple than needlessly complex.

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“pizza pie, post:28, topic:122098”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=171710.msg1593735#msg1593735 date=1184361512]
… you obviously don’t understand how brainfuck works.
[/quote]
i know i dont… im not saying that i do… but it seems very hard to remember everything when it all is made of those characters combined to make something… do you understand my point of view?[/quote]

Something being needlessly complex has rarely stopped people from accomplishing it.

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Hard != Impossible.

Read full topic

+-<>[],.

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Mopman:

Why not? There’s a version of brainfuck with socket capabilities, and “a server” isn’t exactly complex. Anyone who’s used brainfuck for a nice amount of time could write, say, an echo or time server in it.

Then I suppose lawl would have more free time than I imagined.

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Why not? There’s a version of brainfuck with socket capabilities, and “a server” isn’t exactly complex. Anyone who’s used brainfuck for a nice amount of time could write, say, an echo or time server in it.

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Silver Lining:

I hope you really don’t believe him.

item.description:
@cruel wrote:

[quote=“Freddy1990, post:10, topic:122098”]Malborge does looks scary :S
Even asm is easier[/quote]

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

[quote=“aaalba, post:17, topic:122098”][code]public class beerBottles {

   public static void main(String[] args) {
          for(int i = 100; i > 1; i--) {
                 System.out.println(i+ " bottles of beer on the wall! " +i+ " bottles of beer!");
                 System.out.println("Take one down, pass it around!");
          }
   }

}[/code]
Its not written in MALBOLGE![/quote]
no shit, i was just saying that he cud have used java and make 8 lines instead of 500… just for that little code…

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @aaalba aaalba
item.description:
@aaalba wrote:

[code]public class beerBottles {

   public static void main(String[] args) {
          for(int i = 100; i > 1; i--) {
                 System.out.println(i+ " bottles of beer on the wall! " +i+ " bottles of beer!");
                 System.out.println("Take one down, pass it around!");
          }
   }

}[/code]
Its not written in MALBOLGE!

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

The peculiarity of Malbolge is that[b] it was designed to be the worst possible[/b] ([b]most difficult and esoteric[/b]) programming language.

YOU SUCCEEDED!!!

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Malbolge is a public domain esoteric programming language invented by Ben Olmstead in 1998, named after the eighth circle of hell in Dante's Inferno. The peculiarity of Malbolge is that it was designed to be the worst possible (most difficult and esoteric) programming language.

I think the developer made it hard on purpose just to be like “Oh yeah, I’m a master of the Programming Language from Hell!”

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest programming language?
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

WTF! why would the author take the time to do that, they could have just dont this:

public class beerBottles {

       public static void main(String[] args) {
              for(int i = 100; i > 1; i--) {
                     System.out.println(i+ " bottles of beer on the wall! " +i+ " bottles of beer!");
                     System.out.println("Take one down, pass it around!");
              }
       }

}

that took 30 secs, that person probably took like 2hrs or 3hrs

Read full topic
